description: The problem is an ImportError which occurs when trying to import a module containing a function called 'str_function()'. The code runs without any issue until the import statement is reached, at which point the ImportError is raised due to the missing module containing the 'str_function()'
code:
# Program to demonstrate the usage of str

# Declare a string
string = "Hello World!"

# Print the string
print(string)

# Get the length of the string
length = len(string)

# Print the length of the string
